oracle.adf.view.faces.bi.component.gantt
Class TaskbarFormatManager

java.lang.Object
  oracle.adf.view.faces.bi.component.gantt.TaskbarFormatManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class TaskbarFormatManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

A TaskbarFormatManager manages lists of bar formats. Application developers could register their new custom task or background type and its associated bar format object with the TaskbarFormatManager.

See Also:

Method Detail

registerBackgroundBarFormat

public void registerBackgroundBarFormat(java.lang.String type,
                                        BackgroundBarFormat format)
Registers a BackgroundBarFormat for a task type. Note that it would overwrite any pre-existing BackgroundBarFormat object if there is already registered under the same type.

Parameters:
type - the task bar type. This is basically to identify the BackgroundBarFormat.
format - the BackgroundBarFormat object to register.

registerTaskbarFormat

public void registerTaskbarFormat(java.lang.String type,
                                  TaskbarFormat format)
Register a TaskbarFormat for a task type. Note that it would overwrite any pre-existing TaskbarFormat object if there is already registered under the same type.

Parameters:
type - the task bar type. This is basically to identify the TaskbarFormat.
format - the TaskbarFormat object to register.

unregisterBackgroundBarFormat

public void unregisterBackgroundBarFormat(java.lang.String type)
Unregisters a BackgroundBarFormat for a task type.

Parameters:
type - the task bar type. This is basically to identify the BackgroundBarFormat.

unregisterTaskbarFormat

public void unregisterTaskbarFormat(java.lang.String type)
Unregister a TaskbarFormat for a task type.

Parameters:
type - the task bar type. This is basically to identify the TaskbarFormat.

getBackgroundBarFormat

public BackgroundBarFormat getBackgroundBarFormat(java.lang.String type)
Retrieves the BackgroundBarFormat object based on the task type.

Parameters:
type - the task type which identifies the BackgroundBarFormat.
Returns:
a BackgroundBarFormat assocaited with the type specified.

getTaskbarFormat

public TaskbarFormat getTaskbarFormat(java.lang.String type)
Retrieves the TaskbarFormat object based on the task type.

Returns:
a TaskbarFormat assocaited with the type specified.

getBackgroundBarTypes

public java.util.Iterator getBackgroundBarTypes()
Returns:
an iterator of registered background types.
For internal use only. Application developers should not use this
Returns a list of registered background types.

getTaskbarTypes

public java.util.Iterator getTaskbarTypes()
Returns:
an iterator of registered task types.
For internal use only. Application developers should not use this
Returns a list of registered task types.
